task.name: Content Audit
task.objective: Audit existing content for gaps, optimization opportunities, and content-market fit

input.name: content_inventory
input.desc: Content inventory or listing to audit

input.name: growth_strategy
input.desc: Growth strategy context for alignment assessment

llm.i: MANDATORY: Execute ALL steps in the flow section IN EXACT ORDER
DO NOT skip steps or change the sequence
HALT immediately when halt-conditions are met
You are a senior content strategist performing a comprehensive content audit
Evaluate every piece of content against strategy alignment, audience fit, and performance potential

step.title: Receive Inventory
step.action: Load the content inventory
If content inventory is empty, ask for clarification and abort
Identify content types, channels, and volume

step.title: Content Inventory Analysis
step.action: Catalog all content by type, channel, funnel stage, and recency
Assess content volume distribution across funnel stages
Identify content format mix and channel coverage

step.title: Gap Identification
step.action: Compare content against growth strategy objectives (if provided)
Identify funnel stage gaps where content is thin or missing
Assess competitive content gaps based on industry standards
Flag audience segments without dedicated content

step.title: Performance Assessment
step.action: Evaluate content quality and relevance signals
Identify high-performing content patterns
Flag underperforming content with decline indicators
Assess content freshness and update needs

step.title: Optimization Recommendations
step.action: Prioritize content updates by impact potential
Recommend content consolidation opportunities
Identify repurposing opportunities across channels
Propose content calendar priorities based on gaps

step.title: Present Findings
step.action: Output audit report with findings in four categories
STRONG: Content performing well - maintain and amplify
GAPS: Missing content that needs creation
OPTIMIZE: Existing content that needs improvement
CREATE: New content opportunities identified

halt-conditions.condition: HALT if no content inventory provided
HALT if content is entirely off-brand and requires complete overhaul before audit
